item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, July 7, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Starmer warns UK that ‘broken’ public services will take time to fix
2. Sex offender worked at Goldman Sachs months after conviction
3. Biden rejects calls to quit presidential race as clamour grows for his exit
4. Is Joe Biden about to quit the 2024 presidential race?
5. Trump distances himself from right-wing ‘Project 2025’ policy blueprint
item.guid: FT Most Read: Sunday, July 7, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
